column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Karen - Thank you for the stars! I'm glad you were able to find items to meet your dietary needs. I would also recommend our newer Spicy Vegan Ramen
column2: which is slowly becoming a crowd favorite here in Houston -- it has long been a staple at the JINYA franchises in California. But you are correct
column3: Friday at 4PM could easily be considered the calm before the storm
column4: as crowds tend to pick up as early as 5PM and last all the way through Sunday night. That said
column5: we hope to see you again soon!
